title: Local Vaccination Resources
description: To help keep the community informed, my office is providing local COVID-19 informational links to meet the needs of the community and protect public health.
cleaned_text: Local Vaccination Resources To help keep the community informed, my office is providing local COVID-19 informational links to meet the needs of the community and protect public health. While vaccines are now being distributed, everyone should continue to wear a face covering, maintains six feet distance from anyone outside of their household, washes their hands regularly, and stays home as much as possible. People are also urged to avoid public gatherings where people are in close proximity, unable to remain six feet apart, cheering and shouting, especially without face coverings. If you are even mildly sick or think you were exposed to someone with COVID-19, stay home and away from others, and consider being tested for the virus.
